activities: Garnerin Group, Inc. receives personal information related to its associates, clients, prosects, employees, workers, and other individuals who are located in the European Economic Area and Switzerland. Personal information that is transferred from the European Economic Area or Switzerland to the United States is used to carry out and support Garnerin's Human Resources and Commercial administration and management.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Garnerin Group, Inc. is committed to full cooperation with data protection authorities located in the European Union and Switzerland (Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner) or their authorized representatives.
